results.idea: EPS surprise: actual EPS minus consensus estimate
results.description: Uses est_eps and anl4_dez1qfv4_est to capture beats/misses vs consensus. Applied SUGGESTION1 (multiple fields). Both fields have high user/alpha counts so SUGGESTION4 applied. Coverage high so ts_backfill not needed (S3 skipped). Confidence set to 0.72 because historical EPS surprise tends to drive short-term returns.

results.idea: Estimate revision momentum: recent increase in mean EPS estimate
results.description: Capture momentum of analyst revisions: ts_delta(est_eps, 21). Single field but SUGGESTION1 partly applied by using time dynamics. est_eps has high userCount (S4). Coverage adequate so no ts_backfill (S3). Confidence 0.65 — revisions often lead price moves but signal noisy.

results.idea: High analyst dispersion: stddev of EPS estimates
results.description: Use anl4_qf_az_eps (50th perc) and anl4_qf_az_dts_spe (std) concept — here use anl4_qfv4_dts_spe for dispersion. SUGGESTION1 limited to one dispersion field; S4 considered but coverage moderate so I apply ts_backfill (S3) to stabilize. Confidence 0.55 — dispersion predictive but less robust.

results.idea: Broker rating consensus change: recent shift in rating score
results.description: Leverages anl4_eaz2lrec_ratingvalue (rating vector-like). Applied SUGGESTION2 wrapping vec_avg to aggregate broker ratings. High userCount so S4 applied. Coverage ~0.53 so use ts_backfill( S3 ). Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: EBITDA surprise vs estimate
results.description: Subtract announced EBITDA (anl4_ebitda_value) minus mean forecast (anl4_ebitda_mean). S1 applied. Both have strong counts (S4). Coverage ok so no backfill. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Cash-flow upward revisions: change in CFO mean
results.description: ts_delta(anl4_cfo_mean, 30) to capture revisions in operating cash flow expectations. S1 minimal; anl4_cfo_mean has good user/alpha counts (S4). Coverage ~0.62 so no ts_backfill. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Free cash flow per share momentum
results.description: Momentum in est_fcf_ps via ts_delta(est_fcf_ps, 60). est_fcf_ps lower coverage; apply ts_backfill (S3). S4 moderate. Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: Number-of-estimates growth: increasing analyst coverage signals interest
results.description: Use anl4_qfv4_eps_number (count) and take ts_delta over 90 days. S1 applied. High userCount so S4 applied. Coverage 1.0 so no backfill. Confidence 0.50.

results.idea: Guidance vs actual: max_adjusted_eps_guidance gap
results.description: Compare guidance max_adjusted_eps_guidance to actual earnings (anl4_af_eps_value). S1 used. Guidance fields have low userCount but coverage 1.0; I did not ts_backfill. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: High total recommendations (consensus) mean-reversion
results.description: Use anl4_total_rec to find overbought/oversold consensus extremes. Apply quantile normalization (S1). Field has high counts so S4 applied. Confidence 0.45 — consensus extremes often mean-revert slowly.

results.idea: Adjusted net income trend: recent acceleration
results.description: ts_delta(est_netprofit_adj, 60). est_netprofit_adj has good coverage and counts (S4). No ts_backfill needed. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: High analyst revision tightness: decrease in stddev of forecasts
results.description: Measure recent decline in anl4_ebitda_std via ts_delta of ts_std_dev. Coverage low (~0.36) so apply ts_backfill per S3. S1 partially applied. Confidence 0.47.

results.idea: Pretax income surprise (actual - median estimate)
results.description: Subtract pretax_income_reported (actual) minus anl4_ptp_median (median). Both have strong counts/coverage so used without backfill (S4). S1 applied. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Sales beat signal: actual sales vs sales_estimate_average
results.description: Compare actual_sales_value_annual to sales_estimate_average. S1 and S4 applied. Coverage high. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Growing analyst optimism: increasing number of upper estimates
results.description: ts_delta(anl4_adxqfv110_pu, 60) to capture rising upper estimates. High counts so S4 applied. Coverage ~0.698 so no backfill. Confidence 0.53.

results.idea: Rapid guidance change: max_net_income_guidance re-assessed
results.description: Compare current max_net_income_guidance to previous guidance via ts_delta(max_net_income_guidance, 180). Single field S1 minimal. Coverage 1.0 so no backfill. Confidence 0.48.

results.idea: Broker disagreement index: range of individual broker estimates
results.description: Use vec_range on anl4_baz1v110_estvalue (vector of broker ests). Applied SUGGESTION2. Coverage ~0.715 so no backfill. S4 satisfied. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Conservative guidance vs estimates: guidance lower than mean forecast
results.description: Subtract min_adjusted_net_income_guidance from est_netprofit. S1 used. Guidance coverage 1.0; est_netprofit has high counts (S4). Confidence 0.51.

results.idea: High recent standard deviation in sales estimates predicts volatility
results.description: Use sales_estimate_stddev_quarterly and ts_zscore it. Coverage good; S3 not needed. Confidence 0.43.

results.idea: Fast-growing tangible book value per share estimates
results.description: ts_delta(anl4_tbvps_mean, 180). Coverage low (~0.332) -> apply ts_backfill per S3. S4 moderate. Confidence 0.4.

results.idea: Earnings revision kurtosis: ts_kurtosis of est_eps revisions
results.description: Use ts_kurtosis(ts_returns(est_eps, 21), 60) to detect fat-tailed revision behavior. S1 applied. est_eps counts high so S4. Confidence 0.46.

results.idea: Cash flow from investing acceleration
results.description: ts_delta(est_cashflow_invst, 90). Coverage ~0.615 -> no backfill. S4 moderate. Confidence 0.49.

results.idea: Consensus underweight/overweight imbalance: build zscore of recommendations mix
results.description: Use anl4_buy and anl4_under to form sentiment: subtract under from buy then zscore. S1 applied; both have strong counts. Confidence 0.44.

results.idea: Rapid decrease in number of forecasts (coverage drop) as red flag
results.description: ts_delta(anl4_basicconqfv110_numest, 90) to detect departing analyst coverage. High counts (S4). Coverage ~0.726 so no backfill. Confidence 0.42.

results.idea: High announced EBITDA vs previous estimate (revision surprise)
results.description: Subtract anl4_ebitda_value minus anl4_dez1qfv4_est (previous estimate). S1 and S4 applied. de-dup coverage high. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Mean-reverting extreme consensus EPS (cross-sectional quantile)
results.description: quantile(anl4_afv4_median_eps) to detect extremes; S1 applied. Field coverage 1.0. Confidence 0.38.

results.idea: Operating cashflow sudden uptick vs guide
results.description: Compare operating_cashflow_reported_value to max_operating_cashflow_guidance. S1 used. Both fields coverage high; S4 ok. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Surprise in pretax income relative to previous estimate
results.description: Subtract pretax_income_reported_value minus anl4_dez1qfv4_preest. S1 used; previous-estimate field has high coverage (S4). Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Sales estimate upside persistence: zscore of ts_mean of est_sales
results.description: ts_zscore(ts_mean(est_sales, 90), 120). est_sales has strong counts (S4). S3 not required. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Decreasing dispersion in analyst sales estimates (crowding)
results.description: ts_delta(sales_estimate_stddev_quarterly, 180) detect narrowing. S1 used; coverage decent. Confidence 0.36.

results.idea: Large increase in upper estimates for net profit
results.description: ts_delta(anl4_adxqfv110_pu, 30) focused on net profit upper estimates. S1 applied; counts high. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Free cash flow surprise (reported vs mean estimate)
results.description: Subtract free_cash_flow_reported_value minus anl4_fcf_mean. Coverage moderate; apply ts_backfill for fcf mean if needed (S3). S4 partial. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: High previous-estimate revisions signal: recent change in previous_estimate_value series
results.description: ts_delta(anl4_dez1basicqfv4_preest, 90). S1 used. Field coverage high (S4). Confidence 0.47.

results.idea: Net debt improvement trend vs estimate
results.description: ts_delta(est_netdebt, 180) to catch deleveraging momentum. Coverage ~0.543 -> apply ts_backfill per S3. Confidence 0.41.

results.idea: High guidance upgrades: count of upward estimates increase
results.description: ts_delta(anl4_ady_pu, 60). S1 used and field has high counts (S4). Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: EBIT growth surprise normalized by assets
results.description: Divide ts_zscore(subtract(anl4_ebitda_value, anl4_ebitda_mean), 60) by est_tot_assets to normalize. S1 used, two fields only. est_tot_assets has solid counts (S4); coverage ok. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Consensus EPS downgrade signal: negative ts_delta in median
results.description: ts_delta(anl4_median_epsreported, 90). Field has good counts; S3 not required. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Large prior-estimate gaps: previous estimate vs current mean
results.description: Subtract anl4_dez1qfv4_preest from est_eps to detect large revisions. Both have high coverage; S1 applied. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Cash flow from operations beat relative to mean forecast
results.description: Compare cash_flow_from_operations to anl4_cfo_mean. S1 applied. Both fields good counts. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Rapid change in recommended longs (buy count momentum)
results.description: ts_delta(anl4_buy, 30). anIytics counts decent; S3 not needed. Confidence 0.4.

results.idea: High guidance concentration: small range between min and max guidance
results.description: Subtract anl4_afv4_minguidance from anl4_afv4_maxguidance then zscore. S1 applied. Coverage moderate; no backfill. Confidence 0.35.

results.idea: Momentum in announced sales relative to guidance
results.description: subtract(actual_sales_value_quarterly, sales_estimate_average) then ts_zscore. Fields have high coverage; S1 applied. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Decrease in forecast count but increase in stddev — uncertainty spike
results.description: Combine ts_delta(anl4_qfv4_eps_number, 90) and ts_zscore(anl4_qfv4_dts_spe, 90) then subtract: high dispersion with falling coverage. S1 two fields applied; coverage high for count but moderate for stddev so ts_backfill applied to stddev (S3). Confidence 0.48.

results.idea: Large analyst prior-estimate correction for cash flow
results.description: subtract(anl4_cfo_value, anl4_dez1basicqfv4_preest). S1 used. Both fields have adequate counts. Confidence 0.53.

results.idea: Persistent upward revisions in book value estimates
results.description: ts_delta(anl4_bvps_mean, 180). Coverage ~0.65; S4 applies. No backfill. Confidence 0.39.

results.idea: Large change in broker-estimated CFPS (vector range)
results.description: vec_range on anl4_baz1v110_estvalue (broker est vector) to capture spread. Applied S2. Coverage acceptable. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Earnings momentum normalized by share count guidance
results.description: Divide ts_delta(est_eps, 60) by max_shareholders_equity_guidance to scale. S1 two fields. High counts so S4 applied. Confidence 0.46.

results.idea: Stock-option expense guidance surprise
results.description: Compare selling_general_admin_expense_reported_value vs max_selling_general_admin_guidance. S1 applied; guidance coverage 1.0. Confidence 0.41.

results.idea: Analyst consensus upgrade after long silence (days_from_last_change)
results.description: days_from_last_change(anl4_fsactualafv4_item) to detect fresh analyst action. S1 minimal; coverage ~0.787 so reliable. Confidence 0.37.

results.idea: Rapid change in funds from operations estimates
results.description: ts_delta(est_ffo, 90). est_ffo coverage low (0.041) -> apply ts_backfill (S3). S4 not strongly satisfied; confidence low 0.28.

results.idea: High correlation between EPS and sales revisions (leading signal)
results.description: ts_corr(ts_delta(est_eps,60), ts_delta(est_sales,60), 120). Uses two fields per S1. Both have decent counts (S4). Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Analyst previous-estimate bounce: kth_element previous non-NaN
results.description: kth_element(anl4_dez1qfv4_est, 60, 1) to backfill and detect bounce. S3 applied via kth_element. High counts. Confidence 0.35.

results.idea: High guidance-concentration changes in R&D expense
results.description: ts_delta(research_development_expense_reported_value, 180) vs research_development_expense guidance. S1 applied. R&D fields low coverage; use ts_backfill (S3). Confidence 0.32.

results.idea: Consensus earnings beat persistence: ts_product of recent beats
results.description: ts_product(if_else(subtract(anl4_af_eps_value, anl4_dez1qfv4_est)>0,1,0), 4) to detect consecutive beats. S1 used; both fields high coverage. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Large change in announced net profit vs previous estimate
results.description: subtract(anl4_netprofita_value, anl4_dez1qfv4_preest) then zscore. S1 applied; fields have good counts. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: High variance in brokers' estimates (vec_stddev)
results.description: vec_stddev on anl4_baz1v110_estvalue to capture disagreement. S2 applied. Coverage decent. Confidence 0.49.

results.idea: Rapid increase in number of lower estimates (bearish signal)
results.description: ts_delta(anl4_adxqfv110_down, 60). S1 applied and counts high. Confidence 0.43.

results.idea: Tangible book value surge vs previous estimate
results.description: subtract(book_value_per_share_reported_value, anl4_dez1basicqfv4_preest) then zscore. S1 used. Coverage moderate. Confidence 0.44.

results.idea: Momentum in operating profit before depr/amort
results.description: ts_delta(operating_profit_before_depr_amort, 180). Field coverage good. S1 used. Confidence 0.48.

results.idea: High number of upper estimations proportion (adx pu ratio)
results.description: divide(anl4_adxqfv110_pu, anl4_ady_numest) to create proportion; quantile normalize. S1 applied and uses high counts (S4). Confidence 0.46.

results.idea: Earnings quality: adjusted net income vs reported
results.description: divide(est_netprofit_adj, net_income_adjusted) to spot restatements or quality changes. S1 applied. Both fields high counts (S4). Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Surprise in cash flow from financing
results.description: subtract(cash_flow_from_financing, anl4_cff_mean) then zscore. S1 used; cff_mean has reasonable counts. Confidence 0.45.

results.idea: Short-term EPS revision acceleration (ts_ir proxy)
results.description: ts_ir(ts_delta(est_eps, 21), 60) to get mean/std of revisions (operator ts_ir used). S1 applied. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Large reduction in est_fcf variability
results.description: ts_delta(ts_std_dev(anl4_fcfps_mean, 180), 180). Coverage of fcf fields moderate -> ts_backfill applied (S3). Confidence 0.33.

results.idea: Analyst consensus switch: bucketed change in score
results.description: bucket(rank(ts_zscore(ts_mean(anl4_eaz2lrec_ratingvalue,60))), range="0,1,0.1") using vec-avg idea for vector ratings (S2+S1). Coverage moderate; applied ts_backfill on vector avg (S3). Confidence 0.39.

results.idea: Large upward revision in capex estimates
results.description: ts_delta(anl4_capex_mean, 180). capex coverage ~0.617; S3 not required but optional. Confidence 0.34.

results.idea: Quarterly EPS consecutive misses detection
results.description: trade_when(ts_product(if_else(less(anl4_af_eps_value, anl4_dez1qfv4_preest),1,0),4)>0, ts_zscore(subtract(anl4_af_eps_value, anl4_dez1qfv4_preest),60), NaN) to hold alphas only when consecutive misses occur. S1 applied. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Rapid change in announced goodwill vs guidance
results.description: subtract(total_goodwill_reported_value, anl4_totgw_mean) with ts_backfill for anl4_totgw_mean (coverage 0.537 -> S3). S4 moderate. Confidence 0.3.

results.idea: Earnings beat persistence across quarters (ts_product of beats)
results.description: ts_product(if_else(greater(subtract(anl4_af_eps_value, anl4_dez1qfv4_preest),0),1,0), 8) to capture sustained beats. S1 used. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: High recent stddev in net profit estimates indicates divergence
results.description: ts_std_dev(anl4_netprofita_number, 90) as proxy for dispersion (number->variability). S1 applied; counts high. Confidence 0.29.

results.idea: Guidance tightening: narrowing of sales guidance range
results.description: subtract(max_selling_general_admin_guidance, min_sg_and_a_expense_guidance) then ts_zscore. Fields coverage 1.0 for guidance; S1 applied. Confidence 0.34.

results.idea: Rapid decrease in broker rating average (vec_avg decline)
results.description: ts_delta(vec_avg(anl4_basicdetailrec_ratingvalue), 60). Applied S2 and S1; coverage moderate so ts_backfill not used. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: High divergence between adjusted net income mean and announced value
results.description: subtract(est_netprofit_adj, anl4_netprofita_value) then zscore. S1 applied; both fields have high counts (S4). Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Decrease in number of brokers issuing recommendations (coverage drop)
results.description: ts_delta(anl4_total_rec, 180). S1 applied; field high counts. Confidence 0.33.

results.idea: Cash flow per share surprise vs annual CFPS mean
results.description: subtract(anl4_af_cfps_value, anl4_afv4_cfps_mean) then ts_zscore. S1 used; CFPS mean coverage low so ts_backfill (S3). Confidence 0.47.

results.idea: Large change in estimate counts for total assets
results.description: ts_delta(anl4_totassets_number, 180). Field has high counts; S4 applied. Confidence 0.31.

results.idea: High recent correlation between CFO and EBITDA revisions
results.description: ts_corr(ts_delta(anl4_cfo_mean,60), ts_delta(anl4_ebitda_mean,60), 120). S1 applied; both fields have solid counts. Confidence 0.49.

results.idea: Large negative previous-estimate surprise in EBITDA
results.description: subtract(anl4_dez1basicafv4_preest, anl4_ebitda_value) then zscore to find downward surprises. S1 applied. Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: Surge in number of lower free cash flow estimations
results.description: ts_delta(anl4_fcf_number, 60) focusing on lower side via anl4_fcf_low count if available — using overall number as proxy. S1 applied; counts moderate. Confidence 0.3.

results.idea: Rapid upward revision in reported pretax income relative to mean
results.description: subtract(pretax_income_reported, est_ptp) then ts_zscore. S1 applied; est_ptp has good counts (S4). Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Quarterly sales beat streak detection
results.description: ts_product(if_else(greater(subtract(actual_sales_value_quarterly, sales_estimate_average),0),1,0), 4) to detect consecutive beats. S1 applied. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Normalization of EPS surprise cross-sectionally
results.description: normalize(subtract(anl4_af_eps_value, anl4_dez1qfv4_est)). S1 applied; normalization helps reduce cross-sectional bias. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Persistent underperformance in analyst EPS estimates (negative trend)
results.description: ts_arg_min(anl4_qfv4_eps_number, 120) to find when the count is at its lowest recently (indicative). S1 used. Confidence 0.27.

results.idea: High recent growth in guidance amplitude (max - min) for cash flows
results.description: subtract(max_financing_cashflow_guidance, min_financing_cashflow_guidance) then ts_zscore. Guidance fields coverage 1.0; S1 applied. Confidence 0.36.

results.idea: Persistent upward trend in adjusted funds from operations
results.description: ts_delta(est_ffo, 180) where est_ffo has low coverage — ts_backfill applied (S3). Confidence 0.29.

results.idea: Sudden drop in broker score average (vec_avg then ts_arg_min)
results.description: ts_arg_min(ts_backfill(vec_avg(anl4_basicdetailrec_ratingvalue),90), 60) to find when avg rating hits a recent low. S2 and S3 applied. Confidence 0.45.

results.idea: Earnings per share trend normalized by book value
results.description: divide(ts_delta(est_eps,120), anl4_bvps_mean) to scale EPS revisions by book value. S1 applied; counts strong. Confidence 0.42.

results.idea: High recent increases in announced cash flow from investing vs mean
results.description: subtract(cash_flow_from_investing, anl4_cfi_mean) then ts_zscore. S1 applied; cfi_mean has moderate counts. Confidence 0.48.

results.idea: Large changes in gross income estimates (std increase)
results.description: ts_delta(anl4_gric_std, 90) to detect rising dispersion; coverage low (~0.407) so apply ts_backfill (S3). Confidence 0.34.

results.idea: Earnings acceleration across revisions (ts_scale of delta)
results.description: ts_scale(ts_delta(est_eps,90), 90) to normalize within time series. S1 applied; est_eps has high counts (S4). Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: High prior-estimate gap for free cash flow per share
results.description: subtract(free_cash_flow_per_share_reported_value, anl4_dez1qfv4_preest) then zscore. Coverage low for fcf_ps; apply ts_backfill (S3). Confidence 0.4.

results.idea: Significant changes in number of cashflow per share estimates
results.description: ts_delta(anl4_qfv4_cfps_number, 120). Coverage low (~0.327) -> ts_backfill applied (S3). Confidence 0.33.

results.idea: High correlation between sales and EPS surprises
results.description: ts_corr(subtract(actual_sales_value_annual, sales_estimate_average), subtract(anl4_af_eps_value, anl4_dez1qfv4_est), 120). S1 applied with two fields each. Confidence 0.51.

results.idea: Large upward revisions in shareholders equity guidance
results.description: ts_delta(shareholders_equity_max_guidance, 360). Coverage 1.0; S1 applied. Confidence 0.3.

results.idea: Short-term jump in est_ebit indicating operational surprise
results.description: ts_delta(est_ebit, 30). est_ebit has good counts; S1 applied. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: High recent increase in announced net debt improvement
results.description: subtract(net_debt_actual_value, est_netdebt) then ts_zscore. net_debt coverage low -> ts_backfill applied (S3). Confidence 0.35.

results.idea: Rapid change in recommended hold counts (uncertain sentiment)
results.description: ts_delta(anl4_hold, 60). S1 used; counts moderate. Confidence 0.28.

results.idea: High recent increase in announced EBITDA value normalized by assets
results.description: divide(ts_delta(anl4_ebitda_value,90), est_tot_assets) to scale. S1 applied; both fields have good counts. Confidence 0.53.

results.idea: Decrease in analyst forecast stddev for EPS (convergence)
results.description: ts_delta(anl4_qf_az_dts_spe, 90). Coverage ~0.571 small -> ts_backfill applied (S3). Confidence 0.37.

results.idea: Large change in announced selling/general admin expense vs estimate
results.description: subtract(selling_general_admin_expense_reported_value, selling_general_admin_expense) then ts_zscore. S1 used; counts acceptable. Confidence 0.4.

results.idea: Earnings momentum across longer window (annualized)
results.description: ts_delta(est_eps, 252) annual momentum. S1 applied; est_eps strong counts. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: High recent change in net profit adjusted mean
results.description: ts_delta(est_netprofit, 90). est_netprofit coverage good (S4). S1 applied. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Spike in analyst prior-estimate revisions for cash flow
results.description: ts_count_nans(ts_backfill(anl4_cfo_median,90), 90) to capture missingness pattern (proxy for churn). Applied S3. Confidence 0.25.

results.idea: High cross-sectional zscore of EPS surprise (relative to peers)
results.description: zscore(subtract(anl4_af_eps_value, anl4_dez1qfv4_est)). S1 applied; zscore does cross-sectional normalization. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Large upward shift in guidance for capital expenditures
results.description: ts_delta(max_capital_expenditure_guidance, 360). Guidance coverage 1.0. S1 applied. Confidence 0.3.

results.idea: Persistent downward revisions in adjusted funds from operations
results.description: ts_delta(est_fcf, 180) to detect declines; apply ts_backfill if coverage low (S3). est_fcf coverage moderate. Confidence 0.34.

results.idea: High recent growth in announced shareholders equity
results.description: ts_delta(shareholders_equity_actual_value, 180). Field counts moderate; S1 applied. Confidence 0.38.

results.idea: Large change in announced sales vs prior guidance quarterly
results.description: subtract(actual_sales_value_quarterly, guidance_previous_estimate_value_qtr) then zscore; previous guidance coverage low so ts_backfill applied (S3). Confidence 0.45.

results.idea: Rapid growth in cash flow from operations relative to assets
results.description: divide(ts_delta(anl4_cfo_value,90), total_assets_amount). S1 applied and both fields have decent counts. Confidence 0.47.

results.idea: Spike in standard deviation of EPS estimates across brokers (vec_stddev of broker ests)
results.description: vec_stddev(anl4_eaz1laf_estvalue) applied per S2. Coverage moderate; apply ts_backfill if sparse (S3). Confidence 0.44.

results.idea: Decrease in number of upper estimations with increasing dispersion
results.description: subtract(ts_zscore(ts_backfill(anl4_qf_az_dts_spe,90),90), ts_zscore(ts_delta(anl4_adxqfv110_pu,90),90)). Uses two fields (S1). Applied ts_backfill for std (S3). Confidence 0.41.

results.idea: Large jump in announced operating profit vs estimate
results.description: subtract(ebitda_reported_value, anl4_ebitda_mean) then ts_zscore. Both fields have good counts (S4). Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Persistent growth in sales estimate maximum (optimism build)
results.description: ts_delta(sales_estimate_maximum, 360). Coverage 1.0 for max; S1 applied. Confidence 0.33.

results.idea: Earnings surprise normalized by previous guidance (relative surprise)
results.description: divide(subtract(anl4_af_eps_value, anl4_dez1qfv4_preest), anl4_dez1qfv4_preest) then zscore. S1 applied. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: High recent change in cashflow-per-share mean of estimates
results.description: ts_delta(anl4_afv4_cfps_mean, 180). Coverage low (~0.327) -> ts_backfill applied (S3). Confidence 0.29.

results.idea: Large announced EBITDA relative to prior quarter median estimate
results.description: subtract(anl4_ebitda_value, anl4_medianepsbfam) then ts_zscore. S1 applied though anl4_medianepsbfam is related field; counts OK. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Broker-estimate concentration (vec_min and vec_max gap)
results.description: subtract(vec_max(anl4_baz1v110_estvalue), vec_min(anl4_baz1v110_estvalue)) to measure spread. S2 applied. Confidence 0.48.

results.idea: Rapid increase in announced net profit vs consensus mean
results.description: subtract(anl4_netprofit_high, anl4_netprofita_mean) then ts_zscore. S1 applied; counts good. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: High recent increase in announced total assets vs mean estimate
results.description: subtract(total_assets_reported_value, est_tot_assets) then ts_zscore. S1 applied; both fields ok. Confidence 0.37.

results.idea: Large fall in broker rating average (vec_avg) combined with EPS miss
results.description: multiply(ts_zscore(vec_avg(anl4_eaz2lrec_ratingvalue)), ts_zscore(subtract(anl4_af_eps_value, anl4_dez1qfv4_preest))) to combine sentiment and surprise. S2 and S1 applied; ts_backfill applied to vec_avg if sparse (S3). Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Growing divergence between adjusted and reported EPS
results.description: subtract(est_epsr, anl4_af_eps_value) then ts_zscore. est_epsr has good counts; S1 applied. Confidence 0.46.

results.idea: Large change in announced cashflow financing vs mean guidance
results.description: subtract(anl4_cff_value, anI4_cff_mean) then zscore. Note: operator uses anl4_cff_mean (S1) and counts moderate. Confidence 0.42.
